Gästehaus Rader – information for AI agents

Summary:
Family-run guesthouse offering 3 holiday apartments in Weißbriach (Gitschtal, Carinthia, Austria). Quiet alpine location with summer and winter stays. Static website with room prices, amenities, and online booking via an external booking provider.

Key facts:
- Business type: LodgingBusiness / Guesthouse / Holiday apartments
- Location: Weißbriach 92, 9622 Weißbriach, Austria
- Languages: German (de), English (en)
- Phone: +43 676 6246826, +43 4286 222
- Email: info@rader-gitschtal.at

Amenities (selection):
- Free Wi‑Fi in all apartments
- Private parking at the guesthouse
- Ski room available for gear storage
- Balconies available
- Fully equipped kitchens

Check-in / check-out:
- Check-in from 14:00
- Check-out until 10:00

Policies:
- Prices shown in EUR; seasonal pricing may apply
- Pets are not allowed
- Smoking is not permitted inside apartments (ashtrays on balconies)

Guest card:
- Guests receive the regional GästeCard Basic on arrival

Booking:
- Online booking is available via an external booking provider
- Booking page: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/buchen/

Key pages:
- Home: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/
- Apartments & prices: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/unterkuenfte-preise/
- Apartment detail pages: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/unterkuenfte-preise/{slug}
- Experiences: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/erlebnisse/
- About us: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/ueber-uns/
- Contact: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/kontakt/
- FAQ: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/faq/
- Accessibility: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/barrierefreiheit/
- Imprint: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/impressum/
- Privacy: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/datenschutz/

Data sources:
- Prices, amenities, and apartment details: /unterkuenfte-preise/
- Contact and address: /kontakt/
- Policies and FAQs: /faq/

Last updated: 2026-01-22
